job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong>Data Scientist</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>This position will be joining a team that's primary focus will be Government Contracts.</strong></p><p><br></p><p>As a Data Scientist will support enabling and growth for the existing automation efforts and drive forward their natural language processing efforts.&nbsp;This is a cross-functional team that is adding talent at all levels. As an early member of the team, your experience is going to be valuable in making data-driven decisions.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Location: </strong>North&nbsp;Austin office if you'd like to use it</p><p><strong>Salary:</strong> $120k - $135k</p><p><strong>Visa Status:</strong> US Citizen</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><ul><li>Analyze raw data: assessing quality, cleansing, structuring for downstream processing</li><li>Design accurate and scalable prediction algorithms</li><li>Collaborate with the engineering team to bring analytical prototypes to production</li><li>Generate actionable insights for business improvements</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Qualifications</strong></p><ul><li>M.S. in a quantitative field (Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, etc.)</li><li>At least 1 - 2 years of experience as a Data Scientist</li><li>Deep understanding of predictive modeling, machine-learning, clustering and classification techniques, and algorithms</li><li>Fluency in Python</li><li>Worked with terabytes of data</li></ul><p><br></p><p>For further details please submit a resume.</p><p><br></p><p>Austin Fraser Inc is acting as an employment business in relation to this advert. As a professional company, we gladly welcome applications from persons of any age and background and do not intend to discriminate with advert text and terminology.</p>
